name: Rex Has Seen you
description:
Warning: If you have heart complications do not play this.

________________________________________________________________

ROLL UP, ROLL UP, SEE THE AMAZING TYRANNOSAURUS REX KING OF THE DINOSAURS IN HIS LAIR. PERFECTLY PRESERVED IN SILICON SINCE PREHISTORIC TIMES.

Curiosity got the best of you and now you must find a way to get out of this hellhole.

________________________________________________________________

Controls:

WASD - ARROW KEYS - Movement and rotation

SPACE - Interact

"E" - Activate arrows (if available)

This game is a modern recreation of the 1981 horror game "3D Monster Maze".
